name: padding
fit: 适用于：除table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-column-group | table-row外
compute: 计算性：看每个独立属性

name: padding-top，padding-bottom
fit: 适用于：所有元素，除table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-column-group | table-row以及非替代行内元素外，

name: padding-right，padding-left
fit: 适用于：除table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-column-group | table-row
